title: Sparkling Gold Chatai Bangles - Contemporary Kangan Set
materials: Cubic Zirconia stones. Each bangle is meticulously finished with a high polish.
features: These contemporary bangles feature a unique linear design, embellished with alternating floral motifs and small colored Cubic Zirconia stones. The simplicity of the design makes them versatile and easy to pair with both traditional and modern attire. The bangles have a secure clasp, ensuring comfortable wear.
colors: Predominantly gold with accents of blue and white from the gemstones.
occasions: or as a stylish addition to your everyday attire. Also suitable for small family functions (like birthdays and anniversaries).
description: A modern take on traditional bangles, these lightweight and elegant kangans offer a touch of sophistication and sparkle. The high-quality Cubic Zirconia stones add a brilliant shine, resembling the allure of precious stones, making it a valuable addition to your jewelry collection. The secure clasp ensures comfort and longevity.
